sourcesContent:
<template>
  <ag-grid-vue
      style="width: 100%; height: 950px"
      class="ag-theme-alpine"
      :defaultColDef="defaultColDef"
      :columnDefs="columnDefs"
      :rowData="gridData"
  >
  </ag-grid-vue>
</template>

<script>
import "ag-grid-community/styles/ag-grid.css";
import "ag-grid-community/styles/ag-theme-alpine.css";
import { AgGridVue } from "ag-grid-vue3";

export default {
  props: ['gridData'],
  name: "App",
  components: {
    AgGridVue,
  },
  setup() {
    return {
      columnDefs: [
        { headerName: "ФИО", field: "name", width: 300},
        { headerName: "Должность/Место работы", field: "infoWorkPlaces", width: 300},
        { headerName: "Ставка", field: "stake",  editable: true,},
        { headerName: "Часы на ставку", field: "hoursOnStake", editable: true,},
        { headerName: "Кол-во часов на часовую оплату", field: "hours",},
        {
          headerName: 'Бюджет',
          children: [
            { headerName: "Планируемое кол-во часов", field: "bHoursPlaned",},
            { headerName: "Фактическое кол-во часов", field: "bHoursReal", editable: true,},
            { headerName: "Разница", field: "bHoursDiff",},
          ],
        },
        {
          headerName: 'Контракт',
          children: [
            {headerName: "Планируемое кол-во часов", field: "cHoursPlaned",},
            {headerName: "Фактическое кол-во часов", field: "cHoursReal",},
            {headerName: "Разница", field: "cHoursDiff",},
          ],
        },
        {
          headerName: 'Общее',
          children: [
            {headerName: "Планируемое кол-во часов", field: "hoursPlaned",},
            {headerName: "Фактическое кол-во часов", field: "hoursReal",},
            {headerName: "Разница", field: "hoursDiff",},
          ],
        },
        { headerName: "Год", field: "year",},
      ],
      defaultColDef: {
        width: 130,
        sortable: true,
        filter: true,
        wrapHeaderText: true,
        skipHeader: true,
        wrapText: true,
        autoHeight: true,
        autoHeaderHeight: true,
      },
    };
  },
};
</script>

<style>
.ag-theme-alpine {
  --ag-header-height: 30px;
  --ag-header-background-color: #4B79BB;
  --ag-header-cell-hover-background-color: rgb(80, 40, 140);
  --ag-header-cell-moving-background-color: rgb(80, 40, 140);
}
.ag-theme-alpine .ag-header {
  text-align: center;
}
.ag-theme-alpine .ag-header-group-cell {
  font-weight: normal;
  font-size: 22px;
}
.ag-theme-alpine .ag-header-cell {
  font-size: 18px;
}
</style>
